title: NFL Halftime Show, Dr. Dre, Voting, LA Bus Driver and more.
itunes:title: NFL Halftime Show, Dr. Dre, Voting, LA Bus Driver and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! Monkeys are allowed today because Steve said so. The Chief Love Officer gives a reality check to a mechanic who exchanges services for "special" favors. The plot thickens with Dr. Dre and his estranged wife because she is being investigated for embezzlement. Fool #1 shares with us his recent voting experience. There was an 11 year old bus driver that led a wild police chase in the capital of Louisiana. In trending COVID-19 News, Americas billionaires have been the biggest beneficiaries of the pandemic. Boxer Gervonta Davis has crazy comments about his upcoming fight. Sunday February 7 will be historic because of the Super Bowl Halftime Show. Today in Closing Remarks, Steve has a clear message that he wants The Steve Harvey Nation to send to Senate.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
